title: Speaker denies saying President’s willingness to resign, Sajith holds his ground
body_lines: Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardene denied informing the party leaders that President Gotabaya Rajapaksa is ready to resign if the leaders of political parties request him to do so.
"There is a report circulating on social media that I have informed party leaders of President's willingness to resign if they ( party leaders) make a request," he said.

This caused an uproar as Leader of Opposition Sajith Premadasa reiterated that Speaker informed the party leaders of President's vwillingness to resign. " I am not a fool to distort what you said. Don't deny your statement. You are a Tom Pachaya( blatant lier)" Mr. Premadasa said.
"It is you who are coming up with Tom pacha ( blatant lie)," the Speaker shot back.
"I only said President is ready to handover the government to anyone who commands majority," the Speaker added.
Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella also confirmed that the Speaker did say so (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
